name: CCPL Tails and Tales Digital Escape Room
name_original: CCPL Tails and Tales Digital Escape Room
description:
Our escape room this time is themed around the Summer Reading theme, Tails and Tales!

You accidentally stayed past closing at the zoo and are now trapped inside! But, what's this, the animals are out of their enclosures, and talking?! Can you find out what's going on and figure out how to get out of the zoo before the night is over?
